synsets.definition: Complete emotional and spiritual commitment to another person or relationship; selfless dedication that transcends personal interests
Deep emotional and physical nearness characterized by mutual vulnerability, trust, and profound understanding between individuals
Fundamental interconnectedness and mutual responsibility extending beyond blood relations to encompass chosen family and community bonds
Sacred or solemn agreement creating unbreakable bonds of mutual obligation, loyalty, and shared destiny between individuals or groups
Deep emotional connection characterized by protective care, warmth, and instinctive desire to maintain proximity and ensure wellbeing of loved ones
Spiritual and emotional unity where individual boundaries dissolve into shared consciousness, creating profound interconnectedness and mutual understanding
